comment: I enjoyed her class but I learned almost nothing on the subject. She has her class favorites who are the only people able to keep her in line.Otherwise she'll only talk about political issues (it's her daily "stirring the pot') You'll feel lost all semester long, but get an A in the end.

Dr Bill definitely KNOWS grantwriting! There is a lot of work involved in writing grants. DO NOT TAKE IF YOU DONT WANT TO WORK! dr, bill is extremely helpful and knows this subject well enough to teach in her sleep. She NEEDS to write a book for this class because our text sucked big time! I am LOOKING FORWARD to taking more classes with her!
If you want to learn, don't take Dr.  BIll.  But, she is still a cool teacher, unorganized, but sweet lady.

To know Dr. Bill is to love Dr. Bill she is a tough cookie but if you go to her and truly seek help and show interest she will work with you I know i should have gotten a D in Community Intervention but got a C because I went to her for help. She really isn't that bad i kinda like her she cool and very Liberal

Amazing prof with so much to learn from. She's one of the few people on staff that seems to actually know a whole bunch about what she's teaching and isn't just reciting the book. The tests aren't hard if you listen in class.   She is also very willing to explain and answer any questions you have either inside or outside the classroom

Dr. Bill is cool people, but she's a little crazy & will snap on you.  She talks in circles and you'll be lucky if you learn anything in her classes. Her tests are hard because they make no sense.  If you contribute, do all the assignments, & she likes you, you should do well in her class.
Fun to listen to her get so jazzed up about political issues, but her tests are very tricky and a lot of times there can seem to be several right answers.
